wikipedia_page.main: Christina Courtenay is the pseudonym used by Pia Tapper Fenton (b. England), a British-Swedish writer of romance novels since 2009. She was elected the twenty-sixth Chairman (2013–2015) of the Romantic Novelists' Association.

response: *     2014: The Gilded Fan by Christina Courtenay (Choc Lit)
*     2012: Highland Storms by Christina Courtenay (Choc Lit)
*     2021: Echoes of the Rune by Christina Courtenay (Headline Review)
Puankhequa appears as a character in the novel Trade Winds by Christina Courtenay (2010), under the name "Poan Key-qua" or simply "Key-qua".
